meanings.definition: A social gathering or party characterized by noisy revelry and merrymaking.
meanings.sent1: Last night's brulyie was filled with laughter and music.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood brulyie lasted until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent3: At the brulyie, everyone danced like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The brulyie was a whirlwind of joy and celebration.
meanings.sent5: The memories made at the brulyie will last a lifetime.

meanings.definition: To engage in boisterous and drunken behavior at a party or gathering.
meanings.sent1: He tends to brulyie at every social event he attends.
meanings.sent2: After a few drinks, they started to brulyie and have a great time.
meanings.sent3: They decided to brulyie a bit too much and ended up with funny stories.
meanings.sent4: The group began to brulyie, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The friends always brulyie together, making unforgettable memories.
